unnormalised: Been exploring Ayurveda lately! Heard amazing things about panchakarma at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. Anyone tried it? My cousin, Priya, swears by it for her skin issues. Says it helped clear things up after just 2 weeks. Thinking of booking a consultation sometime in December, maybe around 25/12/2024. Costs around Rs. 5000, I think? Saw a good doc in Chennai. He’s available from 10:00 AM - 06:00 PM.
normalised: Been exploring Ayurveda lately! Heard amazing things about panchakarma at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. Anyone tried it? My cousin, Priya, swears by it for her skin issues.
